GeoWorld

Android geocoordinate converter and data collection tool for geodesists and field surveyors. Offers unique features on the market. Converts coordinates from manual input, GPS or TXT/CSV files from/to practically all geodetic coordinate systems. Offers full customization of all coordinate transformation parameters. Based on Spatialte / Proj4 DB and a built-in EPSG dataset. Play Store

Navigate with arrow keys
